https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null The Spartans go to war on the shores of Zanzibar! Watch as the battle continuously escalates in glorious stop-motion action inspired by the Halo Franchise in the full-length feature from Kooberz Studio! Battle of the Brick: Built for Combat
